name: Shoot 'N Scoot
description:
WHAT'S THIS?

Shoot N' Scoot is a game made with Aseprite and Godot! And wow is it unimpressive!

It's pretty much just an arcade shooter; Get to 70 points, earn pints by hitting (yes, HITTING, not killing.) enemies, and there are three cliche as hell ORIGINAL enemy types!

All the sprites, sound and music are mine, though my sister helped with the player.

HOW TO PLAY

Use the arrow keys to move, "Up" or "Z" to jump, and "X" to shoot. Your bolts don't go very far.
